name: Apollo
description: Apollo (Greek: Ἀπόλλων) is the Olympian God of Light, Music, The Sun, Day, Healing, Diseases, Enlightenment, Oracles, Art, Celebration, Entertainment, Stories, Archery, Truth, Prophecy. Knowledge, Logic and Science. He is the son of Zeus, and younger twin brother of Artemis. Despite his status in mythology, he has never appeared in person in the series.
